website_summaries.verdict: Tames even thick, wavy hair to create a sleek, smooth shine.
pros: Adjustable temperature from 270 to 450 degrees with digital display
Dual cover ventilation holes protect the handles from getting hot
Artificial intelligence self-adjusts the iron to standby, shutoff, and overheat protection
cons: On/off switch is easy to hit while using, so if it seems to be losing heat, check the switch

customer_reviews.title: I love this straightner
customer_reviews.text: I love this straightner! After about two years it broke when I was traveling and I turned it in with the warranty and received a brand new one instead. The company is super quick and helpful if you have problems. The straightner is super amazing it stays at a certain heat and even without heat protectant (with use of low heat around 290F) I have no split ends from daily use. I have used Chi's before and they ruined my hair they were just too hot. I am glad I settled on this one, ive had my new one for 2 years with no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Buttons are impossible to not hit while doing hair
